# Detect Chaos (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Adept Spells|Adept 1]], [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Component:** V, S, DF

**Range:** 60 ft.

**Area:** Cone-shaped emanation

**Duration:** Concentration, up to 10 minutes/ level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 266

This spell functions like *[[Detect Evil (Spell)|detect evil]]*, except that it detects the auras of chaotic creatures, clerics of chaotic deities, chaotic spells, and chaotic magic items, and you are vulnerable to an overwhelming chaotic aura if you are lawful.
